name: Aggressively Fabulous Slimes
description:
First I would like to apologize for the poor state in which I'm delivering to you (the player) this game. It is far below what I hoped it to be. I've spent so much time removing bugs in the final hours that I didn't manage to add much content (including sound).

Give your slimes gems to affect their behavior.

Collect gems by left clicking them with your cursor.

Move camera with WSAD or arrow keys.

See how long you can survive!

Credits:

The game was designed and written by me (Ktosox) for the 2019 Yogscast gam Jam in the Godot game engine.

The jewel icons are by REXARD (obtained via humble bundle) available at: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/gems-icons-89910

The tileset used is from Beeast (listed as public domain) available at: https://opengameart.org/content/overworld-grass-biome

The slimes were done by me in Blender.
The entire project is available on GitHub: https://github.com/ktosox/Jingle_Cats_2019
